attributes.action: Bring come fly with me and little Britain back on Netflix and itv.
attributes.additional_details: Just because some people don’t like it doesn’t mean no one can watch it
attributes.background: Get Netflix and itv to bring the two shows back on after some people didn’t like it and made them take it down

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for Netflix.
